DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare patient satisfaction Pataday ( Olopatadine hydrochloride 0.2 % ) one daily ( QD ) Bepreve ( Bepotastine besilate ophthalmic solution 1.5 % ) two time day ( BID ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Patient Satisfaction With Pataday Bepreve
DOC.detailed_description: 5 week randomize study 15 subject use Pataday qd 2 week , 15 subject use Bepreve BID 2 week . Following one-week washout period , two group give opposite test article ( TA ) 2 week . Subjects complete daily diary regard effect drug see clinic 3 exam .
